slogan: We seek to foster the academic, social and physical growth of students to reach the maximum potential of each one.

summary.text: We are constantly focused on perfecting our methods to improve the health and education of children. We work for them.

view_home.second_parrafo: The main goal of the academy is to provide students with a complete educational experience which will meet the social, emotional and behavioral needs of each individual student.
view_home.data_response: Your request was successfully submitted, someone will be in touch with you within the next 24 hours

view_therapy.description:
Eureka Educational Academy provides a full complement of therapy services
which will be integrated within the regular school day.

view_philosophy.title: Philosophy
view_philosophy.first_parrafo:
The Academy’s main goal is to foster the students’ growth academically, socially,
              and physically in order to reach the individual’s maximum potential. The focus is to
              develop the whole child through an integrated process that involves academic systems
              as well as therapeutic services provided as needed.
view_philosophy.second_parrafo:
The Academy will provide various educational methodologies and research
based curriculums in order to develop an individualized learning plan which meets each
individual’s educational needs. We will perform regular assessments in order to
evaluate and provide real time performance data to establish the instructional plan of
each student. In addition, the Academy will implement a blended learning approach
which includes and one-to-one device and various educational software to achieve
maximum results and effectiveness in student performance.

view_about.title: About Eureka Educational Academy
view_about.first_parrafo: Eureka Educational Academy was founded by a group of educators and health care professionals with over 75 years of experience in providing services to school age children in the South Florida area.
view_about.second_parrafo: The main goal of the academy is to provide students with a complete educational experience which will meet the social, emotional and behavioral needs of each individual student. The team has created a clean, safe and innovative campus which will provide a “feel good” experience for both students and parents alike.

view_admission.title: Admissions
view_admission.first_parrafo:
Eureka Educational Academy has established a rolling enrollment throughout the
academic year. However, once student enrollment is at capacity, a waiting list will be
established in order to provide students an opportunity to join our family when an
opening becomes available.
view_admission.second_parrafo:
Prospective students and families may schedule a private tour and consultation in order
to discuss program and enrollment details. To make an appointment, please call or
email below.

view_scholarships.description: Eureka Educational Academy accepts the following scholarships:

view_scholarships.message: Contact us for more information related to scholarships available and how to receive assistance to apply
